subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: Checks that a Javadoc block can fit in a single-line and doesn't contain block tags. Javadoc comment that contains at least one block tag should be formatted in a few lines.

tr.td: Control when to print violations if the Javadoc being examined by this check violates the tight html rules defined at Tight-HTML Rules.

Specify
block tags which are ignored by the check.

Control whether
inline tags must be ignored.
